page.title: 16ARABLE RESEARCH
page.content:
{ARABLE RESEARCH - COTSWOLD CEREAL {CENTRE. IN 1979 AN AGRONOMY TRIALS UNIT WAS SET UP BY A FARMER DISCUSSION GROUP AND WAS CALLED THE COTSWOLD CEREAL CENTRE. IT IS FARMER FINANCED AND HAS MADE A SIGNIFICANT CONTRIBUTION TO THE TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE AND HUSBANDRY APPROACH ADOPTED BY ITS MEMBERS. THE CENTRE PRODUCES INDEPENDENT INFORMATION ON CEREALS AND OTHER COMBINABLE CROPS. THE KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE IS OFFERED TO OTHER INTERESTED GROUPS OF FARMERS.
THE CENTRE IS BASED AT THE ROYAL AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE AT CIRENCESTER WHERE OFFICES AND FACILITIES ARE MADE AVAILABLE. LAND FOR THE TRIALS IS RENTED FROM THE COLLEGE AND OTHER LOCAL FARMERS.
